import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get agent's decisions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agent/decisions/{agent_id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets the decisions for all pools this agent has evaluated.
This is a paginated response. Each page has 100 entries. In response, the
`decision` field is an enum and it means the following:

- SELL = 0
- BUY = 1
- HOLD = 2
- PASS = 3

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"agent_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Agent Id"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1,"title":"Page"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
